detachmentRule.name: Deathwatch Mission Tactics
detachmentRule.lore: Thousands of years of collated strategic data and hard-won combat experience have provided the Deathwatch with the ultimate battlefield tactics to combat almost any foe.
detachmentRule.description:
At the start of your Command phase, you can select one of the Mission Tactics listed below. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Mission Tactic is active and its effects apply to all DEATHWATCH units from your army. Each Mission Tactic can only be selected once per battle:

Furor Tactics

The warriors of the Deathwatch are often sorely outnumbered by swarming foes, yet by striking for maximum indiscriminate carnage they soon even the odds. While this Mission Tactic is active, weapons equipped by DEATHWATCH units from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.



Malleus Tactics

Even the largest behemoth has a weak point, and the Deathwatch find them all. While this Mission Tactic is active, weapons equipped by DEATHWATCH units from your army have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.



Purgatus Tactics

Adopting Purgatus tactics, the Deathwatch focus their ire upon the commanders of the enemy host. While this Mission Tactic is active, each time a DEATHWATCH model from your army makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.

enhacements.name: Universal Anathema
enhacements.lore: A fragment of STC technology, this device tastes the spoor of its owner’s foes, then fashions tailored toxins not even the most resilient victim can long endure.
enhacements.description: AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM model only. Melee weapons equipped by the bearer have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI-MONSTER 4+] abilities.

enhacements.name: Blackweave Shroud
enhacements.lore: This hypermorphic bodyglove of uncertain origin is worn beneath a warrior’s armour. It forms a fibrous medium that shields the warrior’s most vital systems.
enhacements.description: AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

enhacements.name: Beacon Angelis
enhacements.lore: The Beacon Angelis was devised to guide the Deathwatch to the threshold of the alien adversary. Housed within a reliquary, it calls out to the warriors’ augur arrays with the voices of a hundred electric cherubim, its summons so strong that it draws the righteous unto its locale regardless of what darkness may surround it.
enhacements.description: WATCH MASTER model only. Models in the bearer’s unit have the Deep Strike ability. In addition, you can target the bearer’s unit with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP.

enhacements.name: Amulet of Auto-Chastisement
enhacements.lore: This talisman houses a hate-filled machine spirit that despises alien artefacts. Its influence can be focused against the war engines of aliens and traitors alike to disrupt or even paralyse them altogether.
enhacements.description: WATCH MASTER model only. At the start of your opponent’s Shooting phase, select one enemy VEHICLE unit (excluding Titanic units) within 12'' of and visible to the bearer. That unit must take a Leadership test. If that test is passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll; if that test is failed, that unit is not eligible to shoot this phase.

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.lore: The belligerence and transhuman physiologies of the Deathwatch make them unyielding foes.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: Adaptive Tactics
stratagems.lore: Only a truly versatile approach to warfare allows the Deathwatch to focus their tactical genius and best the myriad xenos foes they face.
stratagems.target: One DEATHWATCH unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select the Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics, or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Deathwatch Mission Tactic is active for your unit instead of any other Deathwatch Mission Tactic that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Deathwatch Mission Tactic this battle.

stratagems.name: Hellfire Rounds
stratagems.lore: Hellfire rounds contain reservoirs of virulent bio-acids that eat away the flesh of their victims in seconds and leave nothing but bubbling gruel.
stratagems.target: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit that have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI-MONSTER 5+] abilities.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.name: Dragonfire Rounds
stratagems.lore: Dragonfire rounds explode just before contact, saturating foes in cover with searing gas and flames.
stratagems.target: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.name: Kraken Rounds
stratagems.lore: Kraken rounds utilise adamantine cores and improved propellants to penetrate the thickest hide.
stratagems.target: One DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1, and improve the Range characteristic of those weapons by 6''.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Dragonfire Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

stratagems.name: Rapid Tactical Relocation
stratagems.lore: The Ordo Xenos and Deathwatch alike have access to swift gunships and landers that allow for hasty repositioning in the midst of battle.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One INQUISITOR or DEATHWATCH INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcement step of your next Movement phase, set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9'' horizontally away from all enemy models.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
